elements.text:
Your car broke down so a friend is dropping you off at a meeting. As they drop you off, they are really loud and everyone in there looks at you. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm really embarrassed, but remind myself that I can tolerate these feelings and they will pass quickly.
I feel angry at my friend but remind myself that they are doing me a favor.
I'm ashamed that my friend is so loud.
I'm happy to have friends who are willing to help me out.
I'm energized because this meeting is usually interesting.
